snippet: Pakistan’s chief justice, Iftikhar Muhammad Chaudhry, removed himself from a panel investigating corruption accusations.
abstract: Pakistan’s chief justice Iftikhar Muhammad Chaudhry removes himself from a panel investigating corruption accusations against his son Arsalan and announces the formation of a two-member bench to look into the claims.
lead_paragraph: Pakistan’s chief justice, Iftikhar Muhammad Chaudhry, removed himself from a panel investigating corruption accusations.

headline.main: Pakistan: Judge Quits His Son’s Case
headline.print_headline: Pakistan: Judge Quits His Son’s Case
